testCases.label: Verify database connection is established
testCases.description: Ensures that lab.conn is an active sqlite3.Connection instance.

testCases.label: Verify dogs table is created
testCases.description: Calls create_dogs_table and checks that the SQLite database contains a table named 'dogs'.

testCases.label: Verify inserting and selecting dog records
testCases.description: Inserts a dog into the dogs table and verifies that retrieval returns the correct row with expected values.
